amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.___. None of the funds made available by this Act may be obligated or expended to transfer man-portable air defense systems (MANPADS) to any entity in Syria.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to be obligated or expended to transfer man-portable air defense systems (MANPADS) to any entity in Syria.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Conyers amendment (A048) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Conyers amendment (A048) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A048) offered by Mr. Conyers.
